What are the symptoms of Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS) ?,"Chronic fatigue syndrome can be misdiagnosed or overlooked because its symptoms are similar to so many other illnesses. Fatigue, for instance, can be a symptom for hundreds of illness
